interestingcomments.content:
Recommendations on a GPS unit for T5 /!/ I know Canon makes the GP-E2 as a GPS receiver for photo geotagging, and I've heard good things about.  
As far as a receiver compatible with the T5, what other units have y'all had good (or bad) experiences with?
